document_data.name: Blinding Light
document_data.mainbody: '''''Blinding light''''' was a type of [[giant]] rune.
document_data.Effects: Once activated this rune gave off a blinding burst of light, similar to the [[spell]] ''[[sunray]]'', and would turn the first [[undead]] that saw it.
document_data.Components: Like most giant runes, it required no [[material component]]s to cast, but the process of shaping it could take anywhere from one to eight hours.
